scripts.build-complete-mac: rm -rf extension_out && cp -r extension extension_out && cp -r out/. extension_out/ && grep -rl '/_next' extension_out | xargs sed -i '' -e 's|/_next|/next|g'
scripts.build-complete-linux: rm -rf extension_out && cp -r extension extension_out && cp -r out/. extension_out/ && grep -rl '/_next' extension_out | xargs sed -i 's|/_next|/next|g'
scripts.build-mac: npm run next-build && npm run build-clear && npm run build-copy && npm run build-copy2 && npm run build-rename-mac && npm run build-complete-mac && npm run build-rename2
scripts.build-linux: npm run next-build && npm run build-clear && npm run build-copy && npm run build-copy2 && npm run build-rename-linux && npm run build-complete-linux && npm run build-rename2
scripts.build-fast-mac: npm run build-clear && npm run build-copy && npm run build-copy2 && npm run build-rename-mac && npm run build-complete-mac && npm run build-rename2
scripts.build-fast-linux: npm run build-clear && npm run build-copy && npm run build-copy2 && npm run build-rename-linux && npm run build-rename2
